tool_description: Retrieve currency conversions and global exchange rates.
name: Currencylayer
title: Currencylayer

api_list.name: getCurrencies
api_list.description: A full list of supported currencies.

api_list.name: getCurrenciesChanges
api_list.description: Margin and percentage change of one or more currencies.

api_list.name: getCurrencyConversion

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The amount you would like to convert.

required_parameters.name: fromCurrency
required_parameters.description: From which currency convert. Currency Code.

required_parameters.name: toCurrency
required_parameters.description: To what currency convert. Currency Code.

api_list.name: getHistoricalExchangeRate
api_list.description: Historical exchange rate data for every past day of the last 16 years.

api_list.name: getRealTimeExchangeRates
